name: Chimecho
description: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.

attacks.name: Auspicious Tone
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon and a Supporter card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
